word_mean: 夹在煤层中的沉积岩层。

sentence.Network_en: Buyers might require further assurances before parting with their cash.
sentence.Network_cn: 买方在付现之前可能要求提供进一步的担保。

sentence.Network_en: Her parting words left him feeling empty and alone.
sentence.Network_cn: 她分手时说的话让他感觉空虚孤独。

sentence.Network_en: The parting from his sister had a positive effect on John.
sentence.Network_cn: 和姐姐分开对约翰来说有好处。

jx.jx_en_mean: a point at which two people must separate or at which a decision must be taken
jx.jx_cn_mean: 岔路口，十字路口；关键时刻，需要作出重大抉择的时刻

lj.lj_ly: the best course is to seek an amicable parting of the ways.
lj.lj_ls: 最好的途径是寻找一个折衷的抉择时刻。

jx.jx_en_mean: A point of divergence, especially one of great moment.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 转折点：分岔点，尤指需要作出重大决择的时刻

entry.def: Parting is the act of leaving a particular person or place. A parting is an occasion when this happens.

example.ex: Parting from any one of you for even a short time is hard...
example.tran: 离开你们中任何一个人哪怕只是一小段时间都舍不得。

example.ex: It was a dreadfully emotional parting.
example.tran: 那是一次非常动情的分别。

entry.def: Your parting words or actions are the things that you say or do as you are leaving a place or person.

example.ex: Her parting words left him feeling empty and alone.
example.tran: 她分手时说的话让他感觉空虚孤独。

entry.def: The parting in someone's hair is the line running from the front to the back of their head where their hair lies in different directions.
When there is a parting of the ways, two or more people or groups of people stop working together or travelling together.

example.ex: ...a negotiated parting of the ways for the three Baltic republics.
example.tran: 这三个波罗的海共和国协议分道扬镳

means.word_mean: 1. delivered at the moment of parting as if in flight or retreat;

sentences.sentence: "paused to deliver a parting shot at the door"
"a Parthian volley of expletives from Uncle Billy"- Bret Harte

auth_sentence.content: Her parting words...seemed to burst from an overcharged heart.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her parting words...seemed to burst from an overcharged heart.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her parting words...seemed to burst from an overcharged heart.

auth_sentence.content: I said...a few words to the boys at parting.
auth_sentence.res_content: I said...a few words to the boys at parting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I said...a few words to the boys at parting.

auth_sentence.content: She continued to feel proprietorial long after their parting.
auth_sentence.res_content: She continued to feel proprietorial long after their parting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She continued to feel proprietorial long after their parting.

means.word_mean: 分离, 分开, 离别

sentences.en: He said no more until their final parting.
sentences.cn: 直到他们最后分手时他才又说了几句话。

means.word_mean: 叉路口；分道扬镳的地方；分手处

sentences.en: We travelled to India together, and in Delhi it was the parting of the ways. Ray went on to China and I went on to Australia.
sentences.cn: 我们一起到印度旅行，在德里分了手。雷去中国，我去澳大利亚。

means.word_mean: 分道扬镳的时刻；各自分离(开始新生活)的时候

sentences.en: After college it was the parting of the ways. We all went to live in different parts of the country and gradually we lost touch.
sentences.cn: 大学毕业后我们各奔前程。我们去了不同的城市，渐渐失去了联系。

means.word_mean: 临别时不友好的话(或行为)

sentences.en: As Jim walked out of the door, his parting shot was, ‘I never want to see any of you again.’
sentences.cn: 吉姆走出门去时说了一句狠话：“我再也不想看到你们任何一个人。”
